headline: Will Strong Pricing Power Make Waste Management’s (WM) Q3 Earnings a Turning Point?
summary: Waste Management, Inc. recently announced it will release third-quarter 2025 results after the market closes on October 27, with analysts expecting higher earnings and revenue compared to the prior year. The company's significant pricing power, driven by high barriers to landfill entry and robust capital allocation practices, underscores its reputation for steady performance and resilience in the sector. We will examine how Waste Management's upcoming earnings release and its focus on core...
